WorkItem.Description:

i don't know if it is a bug in the SDK .. of a wrong definition of wide strings .. 
any help will be appreciated ,, 

thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Problem with apostrophes in message body

Comments.Message: what exactly happens when you encounter an ' in the message?
